thread.title: 6 dead in attack on DRC army base
thread.title_full: 6 dead in attack on DRC army base | News24

author: news24.com
title: 6 dead in attack on DRC army base
text:
Goma - At least three Congolese soldiers were killed in an attack on their camp in the troubled east of the Democratic Republic of Congo, military sources said Friday.
Three soldiers' wives were also killed in the assault on the camp at Rumangabo, 50km north of Goma, the capital of North Kivu province.
The attackers also made off with heavy weapons, a source said.
"Three soldiers were badly wounded and died at the scene," army spokesperson Captain Guillaume Djiko told AFP.
